name: Plane fishing
description:
So the theme of the 41st ludum dare was : "Combine 2 incompatible genres"!

So, I did'nt find any idea in my first day, but then and after rolling random genres I found that "A flying+fishing simulation survival game " would be a good idea!

So you control him with <- & -> arrow keys and you shoot trawls on fish with space! You have to get fish to survive for the longest time possible and to avoid shooting on bombs!

I hope you'll like my game!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/plane-fishing
